title: Telkomsel
subtitle: Telkomsel - Smile Loyalty App
body:
Responsible for planning, organizing, and directing the completion of specific projects for an organization while ensuring these projects are on time, on budget, and within scope.

Monitor Project Progress and Set Deadlines. Multiples project devided into several phase to built new system called "SmileLoyalty". A system intended to manage Loyalty Point for Telkomsel Loyal Member. We handle Telkomsel Poin, integrated with other Telkomsel's surrounding such as LinkAja, Telkomsel.com, MyTelkomsel, Etc.

I also responsible to Establish a metrics based organization, develop key operational metrics and push for continuous improvement

Provide strategic and operational oversight for Enterprise software product development

Providing clear and concise instructions to engineering teams and Work closely with business leaders to develop short and long-term strategies

title: Detikcom, Transmedia
subtitle: Detikcom Portal
body:
Translated UX and business requirements into elegant code solutions.
Integrated enhancements into web design to improve user stickiness, smooth functionality, and boost load times.
Maintaining and Updating existing production Web Apps.
Provided security maintenance and patching on website interface to maintain viability after launch.
Adhered to SEO best practices while designing sites.

title: GIC Trade
subtitle: Web & Mobile GIC Traders App
body:
Working in GIC Trade is a big honor for me, My stack was Frontend Web Developer who responsible in Website and Trading Portal, which our team hands on the Web App that our traders use.

I also handle for Cryptocurrency management, such as Wallet Exchange, Coin Swaping ( Pancake Swap ), Binance Smart Chain integration. a lot of new knowleadge and skill that GIC Team has given to me, Next Js Expert, Testable Code, GraphQL, Web3, etc.
